main event: A housewife reported sighting four unidentified aerial objects in Texarkana, Texas on July 14, 1964.
interesting points: The objects were described as bright white lights changing shape,The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute,The first three objects disappeared while being reported,One object disappeared over the horizon,The objects were compared in size to oranges and ping pong balls.
witness description: Mrs. _____, a housewife, observed the objects from her yard.
